name: DeviceDefinition.quantity
title: DeviceDefinition.quantity
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: The quantity of the device present in the packaging (e.g. the number of devices present in a pack, or the number of devices in the same package of the medicinal product)
element.definition: The quantity of the device present in the packaging (e.g. the number of devices present in a pack, or the number of devices in the same package of the medicinal product).
